pages.text: Stores 9 sets of artifacts. Right click the item to open its inventory. Each column in the GUI should be one set.$(br2)When holding the swap, you can see a list of artifacts. Click up and down arrow to select a set, and click R to swap.$(br2)When swapping, equipped artifacts will go to the selected line of the swap, and the selected artifacts will be equipped.
Right click unused slots to disable them. This prevents taking down artifacts when you don't want to.
